title: Account Creation
content: Users can create an account by going to the homepage and clicking on the Sign In button. From there
column4: they should select the option to create a new account and fill out the required details.

title: Hire Mentor
content: Users can hire mentors by clicking on "Catalyst Finance" and then selecting and then filing the form of the mentor you want to hire.

title: Group Creation
content: Users can create groups by clicking on 'Groups' in the navigation bar and filling out the group creation form.

title: Post Creation
content: Users can create posts by going to 'Your Feed' in the navigation bar and submitting the post creation form.

title: What to use for payment
content: Users can use their stripe account for payment.

title: Legal Advice
content: For legal advices users can visit "Catalyst Finance" and then ask their queries to our AI chat system.
